alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Western Twin Falls BLM (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 01 at 2:56PM MDT until August 02 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING FOR SCATTERED LIGHTNING FOR SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS... .Scattered thunderstorms are forecast to develop this afternoon and extend into the evening. Therefore, a red flag warning has been issued. In addition, more storms are expected Wednesday afternoon and evening, leading to another Red Flag Warning for the Southern Highlands, Twin Falls BLM, and the Owyhee Mountains. And finally, a Fire Weather Watch has been issued from Thursday afternoon through Friday evening for all but the NF districts, again due to scattered thunderstorms. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM TO 11 PM MDT WEDNESDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM... WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 424... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM THURSDAY TO 11 PM MDT FRIDAY FOR LIGHTNING FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND WESTERN TWIN FALLS BLM...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 424... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 2 PM to 11 PM MDT Wednesday. a Red Flag Warning has also been issued from 2 PM Thursday to 11 PM MDT Friday. * THUNDERSTORMS...Scattered coverage. * OUTFLOW WINDS...Gusts to 50 mph expected.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.

area.areaDesc: Owyhee Mountains; Western Twin Falls BLM
